column4: ok i right click and open with MPlayer, it opens with no errors but doesnt play?
it works here if I use "gmplayer -playlist" as the command, but note that it needs to cache for a few seconds
yes it works via command line... hmm
well, as the command you added to openwith, did you use "gmplayer -playlist"?
no but ill try that now :P
ok, now lets fix the browser issue... have you install the mplayer plugin for firefox?
ok, so remove the totem plugin
There is no matching application available.
erm ok, I guess they only put that in later.  close all firefox windows, run this command: 'sudo touch /usr/lib/firefox/plugins/*mplayer*' and then start firefox again and try bbc
my mate wants to connect using VNC i searched for VNC  and kfrb came up, would the realVNC client be able to connect to that?
well you can just go to system > preferences > remote desktop
and the REALVNC client can connec to that?
